Use /model to switch between different AI models and providers.
Type /agents to list and switch between specialized AI agents.
Press Ctrl+C or Escape to cancel a streaming response at any time.
Press Ctrl+D to exit the application quickly.
Press Ctrl+L to clear the current chat history from the screen.
Markdown is supported! Use it to format your code and text.
Check the context percentage in the header to see how much room is left.
The current path is shown at the bottom for your reference.
You can ask for help by typing 'help' in the chat.
Try switching to a different agent if you need specialized help.
